attributes.action: Keep the homeless in accommodation after the pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: After the homeless have had a roof over there head in hotels and other accommodation. To only go back on the streets again will only affect there mental health and could cause a risk to thier lives.
attributes.background: The government has made the homeless have sheltered accommodation over the last couple of months. Now they are being put back on the streets again. This needs to  stop. We live in the 5th richest country. And walking past people on the streets brakes people's hearts. Keep them housed

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311860
